scripts.build: npm run build:constants && npm run build:components
scripts.build:constants: npm run build:constants:bin && npm run build:constants:src
scripts.clean: rm -r *.tgz bin build constants/ensureTargetOutputPath.js constants/index.js buildComponents/entriesandchunks.js externals/_AUTOGENERATED_tmp_externals_.es6 test/buildComponents/build test/buildComponents/dummy-build test/client test/constants/build test/constants/output test/nashornPolyfills/output 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.pretest:constants: npm run build:constants && npm run build:components:test
scripts.test: npm run test:client:webpack && npm run test:components && npm run test:constants && test:externals:webpack && npm run test:nashornPolyfills:constants
scripts.test:client:webpack: webpack --config client/webpack.config.js --env BUILD_R4X=$(pwd)/test/client/output --env LIBRARY_NAME=React4xp --env CHUNK_CONTENTHASH=9 --env CLIENT_CHUNKS_FILENAME=chunky.json && echo "-------------- react4xp-runtimeclient builds. ADD SOME ACTUAL TESTS PLZ?"
scripts.test:constants: NODE_PATH=. mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill --require test/constants/test_helper.js "test/constants/**/*@(spec.js)" && mkdir test/constants/output/cli; bin/buildConstants.js test/constants/output/cli && path-exists test/constants/output/cli/react4xp_constants.json && path-exists test/constants/output/cli/build/resources/main/lib/enonic/react4xp/react4xp_constants.json
scripts.test:components: npm run test:components:entriesAndChunks && npm run test:components:raw && npm run test:components:override
scripts.test:components:raw: webpack --config buildComponents/webpack.config.js --env ENTRY_DIRS=entries --env CHUNK_DIRS=sharedComps,redux --env ROOT=$(pwd)/../.. --env OVERRIDE_COMPONENT_WEBPACK=test/buildComponents/webpack.config.symlinks.override.js --env REACT4XP_CONFIG_FILE=test/buildComponents/build/constants.json --env VERBOSE=true
scripts.test:externals:webpack: NODE_PATH=. webpack --config ./externals/webpack.config.js --env REACT4XP_CONFIG_FILE=/test/externals/react4xpConstants.json --env BUILD_R4X=$(pwd)/build --env ROOT=$(pwd)/../.. && echo "" && echo "--> build/" && ls build && echo "-------------- react4xp-runtime-externals builds. ADD SOME ACTUAL TESTS PLZ?"
